title: Unknown error on login!?
body: I have an "unknown error" when logging into league and I am unable to do anything in the client at all... It says to come here if it persists... anyone have any ideas?

replies.body:
What OS and ISP are you with? Did you do any updates on them recently (including if you have an 'auto-update' feature enabled)?

Do you have any anti-virus programs or firewalls enabled? If so, try running League with those disabled.

It seems to be working currently... but i'm still skeptical... Will update soon.

EDIT: Enters champion select, but has a black screen and can;'t do anything...
